animalData.name: Cheetah
animalData.description: A large cat native to Africa and central Iran. They are the fastest land animals.

animalData.name: Mantis Shrimp
animalData.description: The mantis shrimp can push with the speed of a .22 caliber bullet - strong enough to break the shells of its prey, as well as aquarium glass.

animalData.name: Hedgehog
animalData.description: Hedgehogs are quite athletic creatures. In the wild they run several miles a night.

animalData.name: dog
animalData.description: a marvelous, doofy fluffbucket that will love you forever
